block_condition.description: If specified, the condition type will only evaluate to true if the bounding box of the entity is colliding with a block that fulfills this condition.
block_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the condition type will only evaluate to true if the bounding box of the entity is colliding with a block that fulfills this condition.

offset_x.description: By how much of the bounding box size should the box be offset in the X direction (e.g.: 0 = no offset, 1 = offset of exact width, 2 = offset of twice the width of the bounding box)
offset_x.markdownDescription: By how much of the bounding box size should the box be offset in the X direction (e.g.: 0 = no offset, 1 = offset of exact width, 2 = offset of twice the width of the bounding box)

offset_y.description: By how much of the bounding box size should the box be offset in the Y direction (e.g.: 0 = no offset, 1 = offset of exact height, 2 = offset of twice the height of the bounding box)
offset_y.markdownDescription: By how much of the bounding box size should the box be offset in the Y direction (e.g.: 0 = no offset, 1 = offset of exact height, 2 = offset of twice the height of the bounding box)

offset_z.description: By how much of the bounding box size should the box be offset in the Z direction (e.g.: 0 = no offset, 1 = offset of exact depth, 2 = offset of twice the depth of the bounding box)
offset_z.markdownDescription: By how much of the bounding box size should the box be offset in the Z direction (e.g.: 0 = no offset, 1 = offset of exact depth, 2 = offset of twice the depth of the bounding box)
